about_the_game:
Welcome to Journey of Seasons: Heroes!
In J.O.S:H, you begin as Bear Girl who has to find her way through a dark dungeon fighting monsters. By selling items that you finds along the way, you can gain new heroes to play as in the dungeon or assist you! While dungeons can be scary, the Heroes will help you along this journey!



As you delve into the each dungeon, slay enemies one after another in hopes of reaching the end of the dungeon. Enemies have a chance of dropping their loot so make sure to pick that up!

After you beat all the enemies on the floor in a dungeon, the player is awarded with a stat increase that will help get through the dungeon easier!

When you return back from your journey, make sure to visit Verna to sell your loot for crystals! With crystals, you can gain more heroes!

New heroes can either be played as, or can join you in the dungeon after you successfully defeat a boss. Each character has a special ability that will assist you in combat while they accompany you in your party. If a duplicate is received, the player is given a Soul Ring that can be used to increase the player's stats before they even go into the dungeon!

Journey through different worlds and see what each world's dungeon has to offer! Event dungeons also offer special rewards that cannot be acquired normally in the game!

Future Content

  • Wardrobe Function to change Hero's appearances
  • More worlds
  • Seasonal and themed dungeons with exclusive rewards
  • Hero ascension
  • Story/lore
  • and more!

name: Journey of Seasons: Heroes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
